Field.name: RateValueQualifier
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: DealerCode
Field.comment: A code assigned by a manufacturer to identify their dealers

Field.name: VehicleServiceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying service performed on an in-transit motor vehicle

Field.name: TariffDistance
Field.comment: Distance on which the rate for a shipment is based

Field.name: NationalMotorFreightTransportationAssociationLocationName
Field.comment: Code identifying city or location names as established by the National Motor Freight Transportation Association

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either RT05 or RT06 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either RT11 or RT12 is present, then the other is required.
